text:
Cambridge MA, Outbrain (http://www.outbrain.com) is seeking a full-time Research Engineer. Outbrain is a Web-based startup providing content recommendations on a large number of premium publisher sites (e.g. Boston.com USAToday, Slate and many more) and countless blogs.

We're looking for a talented engineer to work on some of the most interesting aspects of our recommendation algorithms.

You'll need strong Java development skills, plus background in machine learning, information retrieval, or natural language processing.

Send your resume to jobs@outbrain.com
